channel.title: Which .java files do i find theese in? and what bit of text do i look for?
channel.description:
I am looking to code my server, but i'm not sure where to find some certain things that i'd like to edit.
- Where you can change the experience on the items you click - The Co-ordinates of where you spawn when logging on for the first time + when you click home - The places where my npc shop keepers are standing - I would appreciate some sort of starter script, and where would i put that?

item.title: Which .java files do i find theese in? and what bit of text do i look for?
item.dc:creator: @Teabag Teabag
item.description:
@Teabag wrote:

yeah, i got all that sorted thanks to you guys.

im working on the shopkeepers and stuff atm.

I created a new home place and a pk zone too.

I can’t find darkmage in the autospawn place… :S[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 02:20:08 PM[/size][hr]I can’t seem to find some of my npcs in the autospawn file, i searched for them and i can’t find them, where else could they be? :s

Read full topic

item.title: Which .java files do i find theese in? and what bit of text do i look for?
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Random666:

[quote]- Where you can change the experience on the items you click

what dyu mean by that??
If your talking about changing exp given with a certain skill, go to client.java and search:
AddSkillXP(
And change it[/quote]
It has to be in the right items case though.

Read full topic

item.source: Which .java files do i find theese in? and what bit of text do i look for?

item.title: Which .java files do i find theese in? and what bit of text do i look for?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Teabag, post:1, topic:184941”]I am looking to code my server, but i’m not sure where to find some certain things that i’d like to edit.

  • Where you can change the experience on the items you click
  • The Co-ordinates of where you spawn when logging on for the first time + when you click home
  • The places where my npc shop keepers are standing
  • I would appreciate some sort of starter script, and where would i put that?[/quote]
    exp is in client.java search for the exp it gives you
    where you spawn is player.java
    Npcs are in Autospawn.java
    And find any command that gives you items copy and spaste it and change (“command nmae here”) to (“starter”) and use the additem or w/e guidelines to add items if you need to more items copy and paste the add item and change the id of then items and the amnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Which .java files do i find theese in? and what bit of text do i look for?
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

  1. Search for the case of the item you click, then change how much exp is given.

  2. Take the coords from where you login at and search for them in client.java.
    (I don’t know the official way)

  3. Go into npc.cfg and change their coords… (I THINK)

  4. Look in tutorials to add a starter COMMAND.

1 and 2 is in client.java!

Read full topic
